"Why don't you try turning off the electricity and unplugging the kettle for a few minutes before trying again? Sometimes, a simple reset can solve technical problems."
"It's possible that the kettle's heating element is malfunctioning. You may need to clean it or replace it if it's not working properly."
"Check if the kettle's power cord is damaged or frayed. If it is, you may need to replace it with a new one."
"It's possible that the kettle's water level is too low. Make sure you fill it up to the recommended level before turning it on."
"If you're still having trouble, try resetting the kettle's power button. Sometimes, a simple restart can fix technical issues."
